programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. programme.title: Dinotrux

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in… except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Smartysaurus is delighted because a little clockwork duck has appeared at the DinoLab. No one knows where she belongs but Noddy is sure that her family must be missing her so he decides to investigate and find her home. Noddy uses all his skills of thinking, looking, listening and asking questions to find the home for the little duck. Things aren't helped by the little duck constantly rushing back to the Dinolab! What is going on? Clever Noddy realises that the little duck is the missing duckling from the new family of ducks at the Calm Farm and soon reunites her with her Mummy and sister. And Smartysaurus is happy too because she can visit her new little friend whenever she wants! Quack, quack Noddy!

KBS Drama Special will produce short dramas of far-reaching impact involving at times a serious social message, unique emotions or perspectives. It will stay abreast of modern viewership.

programme.title: Moving Voices Mini Album
programme.desc: A global music trip to experience the music and the culture of various countries.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: Music Bank K-Chart
programme.desc: Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman,” the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has post‐traumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm’s VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: These episodes are intented to help parents and teachers in teaching and guiding their children and students. These explain different topics that will help them be prepared for the distance learning set up.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: With Gordon Ramsay’s reputation on the line, the top six chefs face the ultimate challenge of taking over the world's largest Hell's Kitchen restaurant.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The remaining five home cooks take on two rounds of challenges that determine who will move on to the Finals.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The final three home cooks take on their last challenge in the MasterChef kitchen in front of a live audience. Each chef has to whip up a spectacular three-course meal.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: Judges Gordon Ramsay, Aarón Sánchez and Joe Bastianich crown the next MasterChef champion and the winner of $250,000.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Sid and Sneha love the area where they bought their first townhome together. After six years living there and both working from home now, their small first home no longer fits their growing needs.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: After 23 years in their small town, Kathe and Joal have run oiut of space. Kathe's dedication to her crafts and hobbies and Joal's new interest in cooking all need extra room.

programme.title: The Art Of Passion
programme.desc: Hope Williams, a successful doctor, meets an accomplished artist on a girls' night out. He is everything her past lovers were not, and she discovers a side of her that she never knew existed.

programme.title: A Dangerous Affair
programme.desc: Pilates instructor Amelie begins a steamy affair with one of her clients, handsome journalist Pierce Dalton, only to find herself embroiled in a deadly love triangle.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: South Korean actor Kim Nam-gil embarks on a journey with his companion, Lee Sang-yoon. Their first destination is the Punch Bowl village, a place marked by the pain of the divided Korean Peninsula.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The contenders compete to win immunity from the upcoming elimination, with the Round 1 victor cooking against a pro for the prize of an immunity pin. First off, a coffee-themed challenge.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: An elimination challenge sees the final eight find what appears to be a science lab set up behind the judges, and learn that today’s first challenge is a taste test - with a twist.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Today’s Mystery Box is the MasterChef classic – the Everything Box, where the contestants must cook a dish using all the ingredients in some way or other.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: This time round it's a Pressure Test, set by top chef Clare Smyth. The judges reveal that today will be a marathon, not a sprint, with the three cooks given five hours to compete the dish.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Today, in teams of two, the Top 6 contestants are out on the farm, and must forage from the plentiful produce to pick an ingredient to feature in a course for restaurant diners. But there's also a catch...

programme.title: The Daughter I Gave Away
programme.desc: Fifteen years after a teenage girl places her baby up for adoption, she learns that her daughter has gone missing from the adoptive parent's home. In her search for answers, she uncovers a chilling truth.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: SAMURAI CASTLES Himeji The Keep
programme.desc: Himeji Castle, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, boasts the tallest, extant main keep in Japan. The elegant main keep and the sub-keeps are connected by corridors, forming a sturdy defense.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Discharged by Death
programme.desc: The latest program in our series on the Takiyama Hospital incident covers recent developments, including the director's resignation, and how the case reveals issues in Japan's psychiatric care system.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: Furui Riho (a singer-songwriter with gospel roots) and shallm (a band project from vocalist lia, who also works on their music and lyrics).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-2.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at tatami mats: a quintessentially Japanese flooring material.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Enjoy the coming of spring in northern Hokkaido with happy kitties. Visit an art gallery occupied by 11 cats, and do some evening yoga with a kitty at a lodge.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: Starting with a fat bike tour of Tottori's famous sand dunes, we ride through this beautiful part of western Japan, discovering a unique spirit of inventiveness and a gutsy approach to life.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: Toilet Paper
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Toilet Paper.

programme.title: Mitateru-phose #2
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Located on the Mediterranean Sea, the beauty of the port city of Barcelona, Spain, attracts tourists from all over the world. Its rich history and unique architecture make it a popular destination.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Through the Kitchen Window
programme.desc: Junko lives with her cat among the mountains of Nagano. She runs a restaurant specializing in soybeans, and passes on her methods to the local children.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Kyoto has about 2,700 temples that hold an array of Buddhist statues. Sculptors breathe life into these objects of worship.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: This time: Asking how to pronounce names. Whang-san works at a trading company. To become a reliable businessman, he'll learn a valuable business manner, asking the pronunciation of a person's name.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: At Yoshimura Mayu's atelier anyone can come in and make clothes. The materials are discards from industry and major brands. And working together leads to great ideas they couldn't come up with alone.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid
programme.desc: A team of scientists braves the dangers of the rain forest in search of a flower that contains a youth serum.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean Luc-Picard and the crew of the newly commissioned Enterprise E battle the insidious Borg to restore the rightful future of Earth.

programme.title: Inside Man: Most Wanted

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: X-Cross
programme.desc: Two female university students go to an isolated hot springs resort for vacation. However, they soon find out that the resort village is the home for lunatics who plan to strap them to crosses and slash their legs. Can they escape from danger in the end?

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: X-Cross
programme.desc: Two female university students go to an isolated hot springs resort for vacation. However, they soon find out that the resort village is the home for lunatics who plan to strap them to crosses and slash their legs. Can they escape from danger in the end?

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A chain mail is forwarded to a group of people - some pass it on while others ignore it. After one of them suddenly dies, a series of mysterious deaths follows. Sandra learns that the chain mail is cursed and decides to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortune. Will she break the curse before it's too late?

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: À La Recherche Du Légume Star
programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: La Rivière À L'Envers
programme.desc: Having crossed the Impossible Falls Hannah, Tomek and their friends finally arrive at the foot of the mountain at whose summit flows the famous Qjar River. A short distance but one filled with obstacles, before they can reach their quest's final goal.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Gastronomy, sport, discovery, exceptional beauty spots and a chance to really get away from it all, the Aveyron offers a multitude of possibilities and something for everyone. France's fifth largest department, composed of vast natural regions, is characterised by an exceptional geography with a harmonious blend of landscapes.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Histoires De Chiens Suisses
programme.desc: The Swiss hound dog is in its element in the mountains of Graubünden. A breed that was becoming less popular, it has recently gained an increase in prestige. We follow one as he covers kilometres to signal to his hunter-owner the game he's found.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Un Dimanche À La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: L'Établi
programme.desc: 1968. Robert, graduated from École Normale Supérieur and extreme left militant, is hired by Citroën as assembly line worker to revive the revolutionary fire. When the company requires workers to work three hours overtime per week for no pay, Robert and some others see the opportunity for a social movement.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: Between Cap d'antibes and the Calanques de Marseille, the coastal footpaths lead us past some of the most spectacular beauty spots on the shores of the Mediterranean and offer a unique view of Provence and its heritage.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: L'Esclavage Au Cinéma, La Fin D'Un Tabou ?
programme.desc: One of the most popular mainstream art forms, the cinema offers an ideal medium to contribute to our collective memory. But, in France, few films ever represent slavery. A documentary where historians, film-directors, producers and actors try to explain the invisibility of slavery in French films.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Normandie Ne Partira Pas Ce Soir
programme.desc: It was the world's largest, most beautiful and fastest cruise ship. Built in Saint Nazaire in 1932, the ''Normandie'' was the pride of France. But it took only a few hours, amidst the chaos of World War Two, for this dream of grandeur to lie broken in New York harbour.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: The smartphone is at the heart of stakes of sovereignty, security and technological control between the American and Chinese giants. At the centre of this battle, the market of semi-conductors, essential components of electronic objects, is dominated by Taiwan, ally of Washington and Beijing's target.

programme.title: Jean-Claude Barny, Le Cinéma Du Nèg Maron
programme.desc: He's known for ''Nèg Maron'' and ''Gang of the Caribbean'', reflections of his Caribbean identity. Jean-Claude Barny learnt his trade in the 1990s, alongside Mathieu Kassovitz. Today a film-director, he uses image to recount his place in the nation's story and the unease of a generation.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr. Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep1
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep2
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: The Devil's Deal
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: The King
programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises swiftly to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90's Korea.

programme.title: Miracle In Cell No.7
programme.desc: A mentally challenged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl reunites with her young daughter in the prison.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, ‘Cart’ tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: The Negotiation
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: The World of the Married
programme.desc: Ji Sun-woo, a successful doctor, is married to Lee Tae-oh, an aspiring filmmaker. Their marriage, however, starts to fall apart when Lee engages in an extra-marital affair.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earth’s very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. After successfully protecting the planet for two years, something is starting to go wrong. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the program’s malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 14

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).
